description: This file is a React component written in TSX that sets up the root layout and includes external resources for a Remix-run based web application. It defines a layout component, specifies external links for fonts, and renders nested routes.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Defines external links (like fonts) to be included in the HTML head.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: Main layout component wrapping children with HTML structure, including head metadata and body content.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Root component rendering the nested routes via Outlet.
